name: What Peeks in the Dark
description:
In What Peeks in the Dark you control a little girl who is lost in her nightmares. As she enters this dark place she must face her biggest fears, and olny her toys can save her from such frights.
For that she can also rely on her best friend, Mr. Teddy.

Find their toys while keeping all windows shut so her worst nightmare isn't able to enter the house.
Find the safe illuminated spots so you don't lose your sanity, and if you're on the verge of madness, Mr. Teddy will be there to calm you down.
